name: Lin Chen 0015
content: Home - Lin Chen Lin Chen Associate Professor Department of Computer Science and Technology Nanjing University Education (2009) Ph.D. Computer Software and Theory, Southeast University (2001) B.S. Computer Science and Technology, Southeast University I am an Associate Professor of computer science and technology at Nanjing University. I received my Ph.D. degree in Computer Science from Southeast University in 2009. From 2015 to 2016, I visited Purdue University as a visiting scholar under the supervision of Professor Xiangyu Zhang. My research interests include programming techniques and software engineering. Programming languagae Open source and software Ecosystem AI & Software Engineering Note: I am looking for self-motivated Ph.D. students and undergraduate researchers who are interested in software analysis and testing. 欢迎本科生、研究生同学加入我们！ （点击查看详情） News ★ 16 June, 2024, Journal paper accepted to SCP: Hybrid mutation driven testing for natural language inference. Congrats to Linghan! 13 June, 2024, Journal paper accepted to SCP: Towards a framework for reliable performance evaluation in defect prediction. Congrats to Xutong! 23 Feb, 2024, Journal paper accepted to SCP: Diagnosis of Package Installation Incompatibility via Knowledge Base. Congrats to Yulu! 23 Feb, 2024, Journal paper accepted to TOSEM: Generating Python Type Annotations from Type Inference: How Far Are We?. Congrats to Yimeng! 15 Feb, 2024, Journal paper accepted to TOSEM: Risky Dynamic Typing Related Practices in Python: An Empirical Study. Congrats to Zhifei! Service ★ Reviewing journals: IEEE Transactions on Software Engineering (TSE), ACM Transactions on Software Engineering and Methodology (TOSEM), Information and Software Technology (IST), Journal of Software: Evolution and Process (JSME), Journal of Systems and Software (JSS), Frontiers of Computer Science (FCS), Journal of Computer Science and Technology (JCST), Science China: Information Sciences (SCIS), ACM Computing Surveys (CSUR), Automated Software Engineering (ASE), Journal of Systems Architecture (JSA), IET Software ★ Program Committee/Review: FSE 2024, AST 2023, SANER 2023 (ERA), AITest 2020/2021/2022/2023 © 2024 Lin Chen
